jadex.testcases.goals
Agent AbstractQueryGoal

jadex.testcases.goals.AbstractQueryGoal
  • jadex.testcases.goals.AbstractQueryGoal
  • jadex.planlib.Test
    • agent AbstractQueryGoal
    contains AbstractQueryGoal, jadex.planlib.Test


    Agent arguments: testcenter
    testcenter AgentIdentifier

    Test abstract query goal dispatched by inner capability.

    The agent defines a query goal which is assigned to the abstract goal from a capability. The capability posts the abstract goal, which succeeds due to out parameter settings in the concrete goal.
